title: Roald Dahl - Over to You
description:
Over to You  (Ten Stories of Flyers and Flying)


Written by Roald Dahl 

Read by Julian Rhind-Tutt, Cillian Murphy, Juliet Stevenson, Sophie Okonedo 


Released by Penguin Books in 2012

UNABRIDGED

Length:  5 hours, 41 minutes


This is an unabridged audiobook edition of Roald Dahl's 'Over to You', a collection of 10 terrifying tales of life as a wartime fighter pilot, from the master of the short story.

During the Second World War, Roald Dahl served in the RAF and even suffered horrific injuries in an air crash in the Libyan desert. Drawing on his own experiences as a fighter pilot, Dahl crafted these 10 spine-tingling stories: of air battles in the sky; of the nightmare of being shot down; of the infectious madness of conflict; and of the nervy jollity of the Mess and Ops room. Dahl brilliantly conveys the bizarre reality of a wartime pilot's daily existence, where death is a constant companion and life is lived from one heartbeat to the next.


The stories are:

Death of an Old Old Man,  read by Julian Rhind-Tutt
An African Story,  read by Cillian Murphy
A Piece of Cake,  read by Julian Rhind-Tutt
Madame Rosette,  read by Julian Rhind-Tutt
Katina,  read by Cillian Murphy
Yesterday Was Beautiful,  read by Juliet Stevenson
They Shall Not Grow Old,  read by Cillian Murphy
Beware of the Dog,  read by Cillian Murphy
Only This,  read by Sophie Okonedo
Someone Like You,  read by Julian Rhind-Tutt



File format:  mp3  (64 Kbps, 24 KHz, 2 Channels, Joint Stereo)
